definition: a friend capable of direct admonition
to admonish/to warn sb of their errors/to criticize frankly/Taiwan pr. [zheng1]

sentences.english: Teacher can become a critical friend.
sentences.chinese: 教師可以成爲學生的諍友。

sentences.english: Thekindest friend there could ever be is the kind of friend you are to me.
sentences.chinese: 世上若有諍友，那就是如你對我那樣關懷的朋友。
